```{r, include = FALSE}
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"

```


- For formatting of package names, functions, and code, follow the [tidyverse style guidance](https://style.tidyverse.org/documentation.html#r-code).

- Use ### or #### to format headings in your post; larger sizes don't look good. Note long headings with #### don't wrap well.

- Spell 'rOpenSci', not 'ROpenSci'

- When adding links to our website please use relative instead of absolute URLs: e.g. `/blog/` instead of `https://ropensci.org/blog/`.

- Use informative alternative text for all images. Regarding the content of the alternative text, refer [to this tutorial](https://www.w3.org/WAI/tutorials/images/informative/). Regarding _how_ to add alternative text, refer to technical information in the [R Markdown template](https://docs.ropensci.org/roblog/articles/rmd-guidance.html) or in [the Markdown template](https://docs.ropensci.org/roblog/articles/md-guidance.html).
